name: 罗杰·格午埃文·史密斯 Roger Guenveur Smith
intro: Roger Guenveur Smith is an American actor, writer, and director who's appeared in films such as "American Gangster", "Final Destination", and Spike Lee's "Do The Right Thing". He studied at Yale University and Occidental College, and has taught at both institutions, as well as Cal Arts, where he currently directs his Performing History Workshop.
birthplace: 美国,加利福尼亚州,伯克利分校
